lines.text: let n and m be integers
print n + m - 1 and a new line
for i = 1 , while i is less than or equal to m , and 1 to i and print 1 i
lines.code: for ( int i = 1 ; i <= m ; i ++ ) { cout << 1 << ' ' << i << endl ; }

lines.text: for i = 2 , while i is less than or equal to n , add 1 to i and print i 1
lines.code: for ( int i = 2 ; i <= n ; i ++ ) { cout << i << ' ' << 1 << endl ; }
